metadata.synopsis: This AD is triggered when you use the Bloodied Flower Key to use the wardrobe in the flophouse to get inside Dolor's lair.
metadata.how_to_trigger: goto 39; -8; -1012kill the Shifterspick up the bloodied Flower Key from the body one of themgoto -17.449 50.881 82.632click on the Wardrobe

0.speaker: Player
0.text: That shapeshifters' key unlocked the door! Interesting.
